text: Won yo si da awon tâ€™o sai gbagbo lo sinu ina Jahnamo nijonijo, titi di igba ti won ba de ibe, won maa si awon ilekun re sile (fun won). Awon eso re yo si so fun won pe: "Nje awon Ojise kan ko wa ba yin lati aarin ara yin, ti won n ke awon ayah Oluwa yin fun yin, ti won si n kilo ipade ojo yin oni yii fun yin?" Won wi pe: "Rara (won wa ba wa)." Sugbon oro iya ko le awon alaigbagbo lori ni
